about.title: About
about.bio_1: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for building clean, efficient, and user-centric digital products. My journey in software has been driven by a relentless curiosity for how complex systems work at scale and a passion for crafting intuitive user interfaces.
about.bio_2: After spending over seven years in the corporate engineering world, I transitioned to working for myself, building custom solutions for startups and early-stage companies. I love the chaos of the zero-to-one phase, where every decision shapes the future of the product.
about.bio_3: When I'm not coding, you can find me hiking trails, brewing overly complicated coffee, or tinkering with my homelab setup.
about.exp_1_description: Building bespoke web applications for clients and launching own micro-SaaS products. Focusing on Next.js, TypeScript, and serverless architectures.
about.exp_2_description: Led a team of 5 engineers working on core payment infrastructure. Improved system reliability by 99.9% and reduced technical debt.
about.exp_3_description: Full-stack development for a high-growth fintech startup. Implemented key features for the mobile app using React Native.
about.exp_4_description: Crafted pixel-perfect landing pages and small e-commerce sites for local businesses. Mastered HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.
about.bottom_cta_subtitle: I'm currently available for freelance projects and consulting. Let's build something great.
